release.action: Changed Slidalicious img-tag implementation to preload the images because of iptv slowness. Changed ImageProcessor thread to a daemon thread. Updated to newer versions of core,slide and builder.
New version to be included in ePlatform 3.1 Release.
Added MutliImageGallery and rewrote most of ImageGallery and optimized quite a bit. Lots of SLide related changes
Implemented threading of ImageProcessor, only supports scaling now but could be used for any image operation.
Declaration of version for use with 3.0.5 core.
